item.title: Autonomous Vehicles
item.description: Self-driving cars are the proclaimed future of transportation. It seems that for years, auto companies have been making bold predictions that fully autonomous vehicles are just a few years away. The arguments for these vehicles are numerous. First and most importantly, self-driving cars would be supposedly safer than their human-driven counterparts. There are 33,000 to 40,000 driving related fatalities per year, and a vast majority of those are caused by human error.
